Bugfix: Forgot to post results from the Asynctask

Updated support library
Saved WFConnection, oops

Lots of refactoring.  Ropes wasn't working, removed.

Unified status message system with upgraded API via StatusMessage and static queueing of all notifications to a handler in StatusDispatcher

Changed screen on network check interval from 10s to 15s

Added screen state check to StatusMessage.send to avoid any UI interaction when the screen is off

Various tweaks for performance.

Bugfix: Logservice timestamp interval didn't match screen on network check interval

Bugfix: Hostup was being instantiated in Asynctask thread context rather than Service context

Reduced widget updates to 1min

removed deprecated locking methods from WFConnection

Tweaks to notifications.

Now using NotificationCompat.Builder

DefaultExceptionHandler creates file as-needed instead of keeping the stream open

Widget updates interval too long.  30 seconds seems about right

StatusDispatcher handler shuts down from service ondestroy method, with a final default widget and notification cancel.

UI tutorial nag pops up a bit later.

Better handling of network disconnection notification

Bugfix: SCANNING while connected would cause disconnected event

exceptions file handled better by LogService and WifiFixerActivity in sendLog

Replaced AsyncTask with HandlerThread: AsyncTask was the source of most of the 100% cpu waits. Couldn't control 5 asynctask pool behavior, etc.
